scripts.serve: cd apps/desktop && cross-env PROJECT_NAME=robot_studio pnpm dev
scripts.build: cd apps/desktop && cross-env PROJECT_NAME=robot_studio pnpm build
scripts.serve:studio: cd apps/desktop && cross-env PROJECT_NAME=robot_studio pnpm dev
scripts.build:studio: cd apps/desktop && cross-env PROJECT_NAME=robot_studio pnpm build
scripts.serve:board: cd apps/teach_board && cross-env PROJECT_NAME=teach_board pnpm dev
scripts.serve:board:electron: cd apps/teach_board && cross-env PROJECT_NAME=teach_board pnpm dev
scripts.serve:board:web: cd apps/teach_board && cross-env PROJECT_NAME=teach_board pnpm dev:web
scripts.build:board: cd apps/teach_board && cross-env PROJECT_NAME=teach_board pnpm build
scripts.build:board:electron: cd apps/teach_board && cross-env PROJECT_NAME=teach_board pnpm build
scripts.build:board:web: cd apps/teach_board && cross-env PROJECT_NAME=teach_board pnpm build:web
